caption: Redirect
Redirects

breadcrumbs.title:
Branch
<#=bcrumbs.branch_desc#>
breadcrumbs.sql: select branch_desc, deployment_target_content_path, deployment_target_params from {schema}.v_my_branch_desc left outer join {schema}.v_my_site on v_my_site.site_id = v_my_branch_desc.site_id where branch_id={schema}.my_current_branch_id()

Redirect_Listing.oninit: xmodel.controller.grid.OnLoadError = function(err){ if(err && err.Number==-14){ XExt.Alert('Please checkout a branch', function(){ XExt.navTo(jsh._BASEURL+xmodel.module_namespace+'Branch_Active_Listing', { force: true }) }); return true; } }
